mapper.insert: INSERT INTO calendar(calendar_no, labeldate, label, title, content, cnt, seqno, regdate, member_no) VALUES (calendar_seq.nextval, #{labeldate}, #{label}, #{title}, #{content}, #{cnt}, #{seqno}, sysdate, #{memberno})
mapper.select: SELECT calendar_no, labeldate, label, title, content, cnt, seqno, regdate, member_no FROM calendar ORDER BY calendarno DESC
